value:
$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Hey, brat. Up and out.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Huh?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Sending you to the castle. King's
orders.$k$pOne of my men will take you. Don't
even think about trying to run.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|One of your men?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|You think I'm coming? I've got a
a bigger problem than you.$k$pThe king said we have to kill those
damn Askrans if they get to the
Fortress of Cinders. That's here.$k$pIf I don't, he'll kill me. If I run, he'll kill
me. And if I lose, THEY'LL kill me.
Guess my time is up.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|What...? Who would obey the orders
of a king like that?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|What a dumb question!$k$pThis whole kingdom is one big pile of
filth. This is all I got. Do my job, and I
survive.$k$pI got family weighing me down. So I
gotta keep climbing up.$k$pThe weak die. If you want to push
back against that, you gotta push
hard.$k$pIf I want to make it, I gotta kill who
the big man says I gotta kill. That
simple.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Family? You have a little sister, don't
you?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|You do, don't you? That's why you
didn't kill me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I knew you were a good guy...even if
you look like a bad guy.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Not so fast, brat. I just might kill you
yet.$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hahaha! So you finally made it, you
pieces of filth!$k$pThis ain't all of you, is it? OK, this
won't take long. Line up and I'll drop
my axe on your necks, one by one...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You aren't so lucky, I'm afraid. Heroes
fight at our side, each worth a squad
of your men!$k$pGather the forces of Múspell to your
side if you like! No matter what, we
will claim victory today.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The hell you will! Bring it on. I'll chop
up anybody you throw at me!$k$p$Sbs1000|
$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I can't die yet... Not yet...$k$pMenja...needs me...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|One squad down. Keep it up—all the
way to Surtr.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Fjorm!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Who—$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, Fjorm! It's really you!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ylgr?$k$pHow...$k$pNo, it doesn't matter. Oh, I'm so glad
you're safe!$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|They tried to take me to Surtr's castle,
but I managed to get away...$k$pI can't believe I found you!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|This is my sister, Ylgr. She's the
youngest of the four of us. Gunnthrá,
our brother Hríd, me, and then Ylgr.$k$pWhen Surtr's forces invaded Nifl, we
were scattered...$k$pI had no idea if any of them were
alive or dead.$k$pBut you're here, Ylgr... Safe!$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Who, um... Who are all these people?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|They come from Askr. This is Prince
Alfonse, Princess Sharena, and...$k$p*cough*$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|That cough sounds bad! Did you
catch a cold? I can help with that!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Ylgr. You must have been
through so much, but even so...you're
still so sweet.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|They're so cute together! Hey,
Alfonse, aren't they just like us?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Princess Ylgr, speaking as the
commander here... It doesn't seem
you're ready for battle. Perhaps—$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|No way! Now that I've found you,
there's no way you're getting rid
of me!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Please, Fjorm! Say I can come too.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I'm not sure... What do you all think?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The road ahead has many dangers. I
don't want to see your sister hurt.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'll be careful, I promise! Please,
Alfonse! I'll be fine!$k$pRight, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Come on, you two! Let's bring her
along! The sisters were just reunited,
after all...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well, if you insist. But we must do
everything we can to keep her safe.$k$p$Sbs150|
